body:
- added zoom in Lyrics window
- minor fixes
- translation updates: French (100%), Turkish (100%), Dutch (100%), Polish (100%), Bulgarian (94%)

- reworked browsing
- connect via unix socket per default
- removed profiles
- added A-B loop mode
- added French translation (#62)

- reworked keybindings
- removed stored playlist features (911e52b0f75694f2c1a438e27d49bb73c1bb54eb)
- removed "enqueue" buttons
- converted artist list to a plane filter without extra functions just like the genre list
- made profile switch more reliable 
- fixed #52
- minor fixes

- fixed profile switch bug
- allow moving the window by dragging the album cover
- minor GUI fixes

- added Polish translation thanks to Łukasz Drukała
- auto size main cover
- internal cleanups and fixes
- minor GUI cleanups

- added Turkish translation thanks to Oğuz Ersen
- removed libnotify, bs4 and requests dependency
- updated custom icons
- reworked output controls
- internal cleanups
- fixed https://github.com/SoongNoonien/mpdevil/issues/48
- minor fixes

- display songs in a more compact way
- added Bulgarian translation thanks to Georgi Kamenov
- improved compatibility with proportional fonts (e.g. Cantarell)
- added basic stored playlists management #28
- fixed #47
- other minor fixes
- fixed translations in flatpak environment

- reworked browser to support `*sort` tags (#45)
- fixed mini player mode
- some early preparations for a smooth transition to gtk4
- switched to meson build system

- fixed popover placing
- internal cleanups/simplifications

- performance improvements
- reworked genre filter
- reworked settings dialog
- reworked connection profiles
- allow connecting via unix domain sockets
- new lyrics icon
- added database update indicator
- new shortcut for single mode one shot
- internal cleanups
- minor fixes

- added "rewind-mode" (#29)
- improved genre filter (#31)
- fixed sorting (#32)
- removed action bar in playlist (#30)
- "technical details" are now optional (#30)
- internal cleanups
- typographical improvements
- other fixes (#27, #33, #34, #35)

- various bug fixes
- internal cleanups

- allow adding whole artists
- consistently provide "append", "play" and "enqueue" functions
- use "albumart" and "readpicture" mpd commands (when available)
to fetch missing covers
- new symbolic app icon
- faster search
- small cleanups and fixes
- MPRIS is now optional
- some keybindings have changed
- fixed unneeded hard drive writes (gsettings sync) when installed via flatpak

- automatically save main window layout
- remember mini player state
- allow moving the mini player by dragging the cover 
- slightly reworked general settings (also changed defaults)
- added symbolic app icon
- small app icon style fixes
- added mpd specific icons (consume mode, single mode)
This is the first major version of mpdevil! Since 0.9.9 there was just a small fix for the flatpak packages.

- added ability to open song files with any application (useful for tag editors)
Open the SongPopover (right click on any song): If the song is saved on the local machine there will be a small button in the lower right corner to open the song file. (currently not working with flatpak)
- added progress bar to indicate cover loading progress
- minor cleanups and fixes

- improved mpd permissions handling
- added tooltips to prev/next buttons
- dropped dbus-python dependency
- added appdata file
- changed app-id form "org.mpdevil" to "org.mpdevil.mpdevil" (freedesktop standard)
## Migrate settings
Since the app-id was changed the settings of mpdevil are now stored in a different location. If you want to migrate your settings from an older version run the following commands after the update:
`$ dconf dump /org/mpdevil/ > mpdevil.settings`
`$ dconf reset -f /org/mpdevil/`
`$ dconf load /org/mpdevil/mpdevil/ < mpdevil.settings`
`$ rm mpdevil.settings`

## Applications menu entry
With the app-id change the .desktop file of mpdevil was also renamed. If mpdevil is linked to your panel or the favorites in your applications menu these entries will vanish after the update and have to be renewed.

- replaced album dialog with a popover
- faster cover loading
- enabled interactive search in playlist
- keyboard focus is now highlighted with just one blue line
- fixed #14
- minor fixes

- added Dutch translation by Martin de Reuver
- fixed #12 
- support single mode oneshot (MPD >=0.21)

- new app icon
- support reordering single tracks in playlist
- polished dialogs
- added a fallback music directory (xdg default dir)
- improved startup
- bug fixes (#11)

- support .cue files with MPD 0.22
- moved profiles into main menu
- improved keyboard usability (made focus cycle smaller)
- removed heading of artist column
- made genre popup more compact
- removed genre button from headerbar in CSD mode
(did produce some graphical artifacts in combination with large fonts)
- minor fixes and cleanups

- fixed lyrics fetching (lyricwiki -> letras)
- internal cleanups

- added mini player mode
- added shortcuts window
- reworked keyboard shortcuts
- internal improvements

This is a bug fix release.

- fixed wrong parsing of 'audio_output_format' (caused issues with .ogg files)
- fixed permanently gui stall caused by slow ping times
- code style fixes

- major code review
- introduced python based build
- removed cover frame (cover is now 20px larger)
- added more icon sizes improving compatibility with desktops like plasma
- bug fixes
- added hidden option (refresh-interval) for very slow computers
(see: `gsettings describe org.mpdevil refresh-interval`)

.deb package
------------------
It is now possible to install the `.deb` package on any architecture. I tested amd64, i386 and ARM (Raspberry Pi 1 B).

- made cover regex configurable (#8 )
- internal cleanups
- reworked dialogs
- added an action bar to the playlist
- disabled auto scroll in single mode
- bug fixes

Arch, Manjaro:
-------------------
mpdevil is now available from the AUR: https://aur.archlinux.org/packages/mpdevil/

- internal cleanup
- added new keybindings (see https://github.com/SoongNoonien/mpdevil/wiki/Usage)
- made lyrics button optional (#5)
- changed fallback cover (#7)

- bug fixes
- layout improvements
- new default settings
- added ability to search by a specific tag
